results.title: Dihedral kaleidoscopes (TEFC)
results.creator_credit: Art Landy, International Film Bureau and University of Minnesota
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Geometry”.
Presents basic ideas of symmetry by exhibiting dihedral groups by reflections of intersecting mirrors. From reflection in a single mirror the film proceeds to study the surprising effects and beautiful patterns that can be produced with two or three mirrors. Observations on the general case are made as well as on the limiting case in which two mirrors are parallel.

results.title: The Digestive system
results.creator_credit: William Kay and Encyclopaedia Britannica Films
results.brief_description: Animation, x-ray photography, and laboratory experiments show how the human digestive system breaks food down into substances which will provide energy for living. Examines the behaviour and function of each organ or structure involved in the digestive process.
results.description: Animation, x-ray photography, and laboratory experiments show how the human digestive system breaks food down into substances which will provide energy for living. Examines the behaviour and function of each organ or structure involved in the digestive process.

results.title: Digestion of food
results.brief_description: A summary of the digestive process, including the following aspects: the function of the mouth; stomach, and small intestine; secretions and enzymes - the systems affected and the products formed; reactions, digestive movements, and their control (recorded by microphotography); the relation of the circulatory and nervous systems to the digestive process; motility of the digestive tract - normal movements, hypermotility, inhibition, hunger contractions, segmentations, peristalsis and anti-peristalsis; and motility of the intestinal villi.

results.title: Digestion in our bodies
results.brief_description: The steps in the digestive process and the functions of the main organs. How and why food must be digested before the body can use it. Why correct eating attitudes and habits are important. Uses X-ray techniques and simple diagrams.

results.title: Different with dignity
results.brief_description: In five separate episodes, this film explores the various perceptions of male and female roles within a marriage. After each episode, a question is raised for further class discussion on everything from sexual stereotypes to what it means to be a good parent. Cast includes Richard Jackal, Jeffrey Hunter and Vera Miles.

results.title: The Difference between us
results.creator_credit: Dan Klugherz and National Educational Television
results.brief_description: Shows the different practices of English and American secondary schools as shown in typical London and Chicago examples. In England there is segregation of students by ability, specialisation of courses and emphasis on passing external examinations, the school atmosphere generally formal and authoritarian, and with some social stratification of schools. In America students of all abilities are in the same classes, the supervision is relatively relaxed and permissive and social adjustment and development of individual personality is emphasised. There is much experiment and variation between schools, and some social discrimination particularly against African Americans.

results.title: The Diesel tractor
results.creator_credit: R. Lapresle, Denis Ward and Technical and Scientific Films
results.brief_description: Explains the principles of the operation of the diesel tractor and illustrates methods of service on the farm. The film compares the basic principles of operation of spark ignition and compression ignition engines; stresses the need for cleanliness in the transfer and storage of fuel; describes in detail the engine fuel system and how to service the injector and filter units; recommends the use of heavy duty detergent oils to reduce varnish formation on pistons.

results.title: Diesel Engine Governors
results.creator_credit: United States. Navy. Bureau of Aeronautics
results.brief_description: Discusses three main assemblies of the governor and explains its function in regulating the amount of fuel injected into a diesel engine. Reviews the operation of the manual fuel control to explain the action of the governor through low, intermediates and high-speed ranges.
results.description: Discusses three main assemblies of the governor and explains its function in regulating the amount of fuel injected into a diesel engine. Reviews the operation of the manual fuel control to explain the action of the governor through low, intermediates and high-speed ranges.

results.title: The Diesel engine
results.brief_description: Old and new type fire syringe illustrates principles of compression, ignition and expansion. How it applies to the diesel engine. Operation and component parts of four-stroke cycle, double acting and opposed piston engines. Working of fuel injection systems.
